text: ما تسبق من امة اجلها وما يستـخرون

translations.translation: No nation can advance its appointed time nor can they delay it.
No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
No people can outstrip the term for its destruction nor can it delay it.
Every nation can only live for the time appointed for it.
No group may advance its appointed promise nor postpone it.
No nation can advance its term, nor delay it.
No people can hasten on their doom nor can they postpone (it).
and no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.
No nation can outstrip its term nor can they lag behind.
no people can forestall their doom, nor can they delay it.
No community precedeth the term thereof nor doth it fall behind.
No nation can advance its time nor can it defer it.
Neither can a people anticipate its term, nor delay it.
No nation can anticipate its term, nor delay it.
No nation can outstrip its term, nor do they put it back.
No nation can bring its time forward, nor can they delay it.
No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
[15:5] No community (min ummatin: min is extra) can outstrip its [predetermined] term nor can they [seek to] delay it, [nor can they] put it off.

(No nation can outstrip its term) He says: no nation perishes or is destroyed before the appointed time for its perishing or destruction (nor can they lag behind) no nation is given respite when its appointed time comes.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
بحيث { مَّا تَسْبِقُ } وما تتقدم { مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا } الذي عين لإهلاكها { وَمَا يَسْتَأْخِرُونَ } [الحجر: 5] عنه
 بل متى وصلوا إليه هلكوا حتماً
 بحيث لا يسع له التقديم والتأخير أصلاً


{ وَ } كيف لا نهلكهم ونعذبهم بأشد العذاب ولا ننتقم عنهم
